short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explode your favourite anime on your chrome home & new tab pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want changing anime wallpapers and information on your chrome home page?
Would you like checking out OPs, EDs, and OSTs from your favorite anime directly from your chrome home page?
Most importantly, do you like anime, and would like to have a cool anime browser experience?

Look no further, and explode your favorite anime on your chrome easily.
